traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
